DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of GK Activator (2) at doses ranging from 25mg - 100mg po bid, administered alone or in combination with metformin, in patients with type 2 diabetes. Eligible patients will be those who have completed study BM18248 (GK Activator (2) monotherapy) or BM18249 (GK Activator (2) and metformin); they will continue on the same treatment regimen (mono or combination therapy) as they received in the initial study. The anticipated time on study treatment is 3-12 months, and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of GK Activator (2) in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.criteria: type 2 diabetic patients who have completed studies BM18248 or BM18249; patients considered by the investigator to be suitable for long term treatment with GK Activator (2). type 1 diabetes mellitus; women who are pregnant, breastfeeding or not using adequate contraceptive methods.
